articles.title: 'Idol' Judges Simon, Paula and Randy Reunite for Kelly Clarkson's Walk of Fame Star - TMZ
articles.description: 'American Idol' trio Simon Cowell, Paula Abdul and Randy Jackson have reunited once again ... in the name of supporting Kelly Clarkson as she earned her star on the Hollywood Wall of Fame!!
articles.content: "American Idol" trio Simon Cowell, Paula Abdul and Randy Jackson are putting the band back together -- at least for today, all in the name of supporting Kelly Clarkson and her new star on the Hollywo… [+942 chars]

articles.title: At Scientific American: Webb Is Breaking the Big Bang Paradigm - Walter Bradley Center for Natural and Artificial Intelligence
articles.description: The Big Bang as a basic concept will doubtless survive. But much “settled science” seems to be getting a, perhaps needed, shakeup.
articles.content: Last weekend, we said whatever one thinks about the Big Bang, it was evident that the James Webb Space Telescope had shaken up astronopmy. At Scientific American, science writer JonathanOCallaghan se… [+3814 chars]
